title: Freedom from dust
brief_description: Surveys the problem of industrial air and water pollution, and the difficulties of effective waste disposal. Shows the instruments which are used to measure pollution in industrial areas, and the various possible measures to prevent or alleviate it.
description: Surveys the problem of industrial air and water pollution, and the difficulties of effective waste disposal. Shows the instruments which are used to measure pollution in industrial areas, and the various possible measures to prevent or alleviate it.
